languages.text: "Прежде, чем я оставлю тебя и отправлюсь охотиться на Немезита, я прошу Домин благословить меня. Я клялась вечно быть подле тебя, но ухожу. Дозволь мне это, проведи церемонию сплетения". {n}Кибелла кивает в сторону алтаря.{/n} "Когда твои люди уйдут, здесь, под взглядом Неумирающего, мы начнем обряд".

traits.locale_text: "Прежде, чем я оставлю тебя и отправлюсь охотиться на Немезита, я прошу Домин благословить меня. Я клялась вечно быть подле тебя, но ухожу. Дозволь мне это, проведи церемонию сплетения". {n}Кибелла кивает в сторону алтаря.{/n} "Когда твои люди уйдут, здесь, под взглядом Неумирающего, мы начнем обряд".

languages.text: "Before I depart to hunt for Nemesite, I ask the Domin to bless me. I pledged never to leave your side, yet the hunt demands that I do just that. Grant me this permission by performing the ceremony of twining." {n}Kibellah nods toward the altar.{/n} "When your people have taken their leave, under the gaze of the Undying One, we will begin the rite."
languages.original_text: "Прежде, чем я оставлю тебя и отправлюсь охотиться на Немезита, я прошу Домин благословить меня. Я клялась вечно быть подле тебя, но ухожу. Дозволь мне это, проведи церемонию сплетения". {n}Кибелла кивает в сторону алтаря.{/n} "Когда твои люди уйдут, здесь, под взглядом Неумирающего, мы начнем обряд".

traits.locale_text: "Before I depart to hunt for Nemesite, I ask the Domin to bless me. I pledged never to leave your side, yet the hunt demands that I do just that. Grant me this permission by performing the ceremony of twining." {n}Kibellah nods toward the altar.{/n} "When your people have taken their leave, under the gaze of the Undying One, we will begin the rite."

"Before I leave you to hunt Nemesite, I ask Enim to bless me. I pledged to be by your side forever, but I am leaving now. Grant me this permission by performing the Tue'ri ceremony." {n}Kibellah looks around the shrine and nods toward a shady nook hidden from prying eyes.{/n} "It is quiet enough, and the gaze of the Undying One hallows this place. You may perform the ceremony here."

"Before I depart to hunt for Nemesite, I ask the Domin to bless me. I pledged never to leave your side, yet the hunt demands that I do just that. Grant me this permission by performing the ceremony of twining." {n}Kibellah nods toward the altar.{/n} "When your people have taken their leave, under the gaze of the Undying One, we will begin the rite."

Grant me this permission by performing the Tue'ri ceremony." {n}Kibellah looks around the shrine and nods toward a shady nook hidden away from prying eyes.{/n} "It is quiet enough, and the gaze of the Undying One hallows this place. You may perform the ceremony here."

"Before I depart to hunt for Nemesite, I ask the Domin to bless me. I pledged never to leave your side, yet the hunt demands that I do just that. Grant me this permission by performing the ceremony of twining." {n}Kibellah nods toward the altar.{/n} "When your people have taken their leave, under the gaze of the Undying One, we will begin the rite."

languages.text: "Bevor ich mich auf die Jagd nach Nemesit mache, bitte ich {mf|den|die} Domin um {mf|seinen|ihren} Segen. Ich habe geschworen, Euch nie von der Seite zu weichen, aber die Jagd verlangt genau das von mir. Gewährt mir diese Erlaubnis durch die Verbindungszeremonie." {n}Kibellah nickt in Richtung des Altars.{/n} "Sobald Eure Leute gegangen sind, beginnen wir vor den Augen des Todlosen mit dem Ritus."
languages.original_text: "Before I depart to hunt for Nemesite, I ask the Domin to bless me. I pledged never to leave your side, yet the hunt demands that I do just that. Grant me this permission by performing the ceremony of twining." {n}Kibellah nods toward the altar.{/n} "When your people have taken their leave, under the gaze of the Undying One, we will begin the rite."

traits.locale_text: "Bevor ich mich auf die Jagd nach Nemesit mache, bitte ich {mf|den|die} Domin um {mf|seinen|ihren} Segen. Ich habe geschworen, Euch nie von der Seite zu weichen, aber die Jagd verlangt genau das von mir. Gewährt mir diese Erlaubnis durch die Verbindungszeremonie." {n}Kibellah nickt in Richtung des Altars.{/n} "Sobald Eure Leute gegangen sind, beginnen wir vor den Augen des Todlosen mit dem Ritus."

languages.text: «Antes de partir en busca de Nemesitio, ruego {mf|al|a la} Domin que me bendiga. Juré que jamás me apartaría de su lado, mas la cacería exige que haga justamente eso. Deme su permiso con la ceremonia del entrelazamiento». {n}Kibellah señala con la cabeza hacia el altar.{/n} «Cuando su gente se haya marchado, comenzaremos el ritual bajo la mirada del Inmortal».
languages.original_text: "Before I depart to hunt for Nemesite, I ask the Domin to bless me. I pledged never to leave your side, yet the hunt demands that I do just that. Grant me this permission by performing the ceremony of twining." {n}Kibellah nods toward the altar.{/n} "When your people have taken their leave, under the gaze of the Undying One, we will begin the rite."

traits.locale_text: «Antes de partir en busca de Nemesitio, ruego {mf|al|a la} Domin que me bendiga. Juré que jamás me apartaría de su lado, mas la cacería exige que haga justamente eso. Deme su permiso con la ceremonia del entrelazamiento». {n}Kibellah señala con la cabeza hacia el altar.{/n} «Cuando su gente se haya marchado, comenzaremos el ritual bajo la mirada del Inmortal».

languages.text: 「ネメサイト狩りに出発する前に、ドミンに祝福を願いたいです。あなたのそばを離れないと誓いましたが、狩りのために行かなければなりません。撚り合わせの儀式を行うことで、私にこの許可を与えてください」{n}キベラは祭壇に向かってうなずいた。{/n}「不死の者のまなざしの下で、あなたの民が旅立ったとき、私たちは儀式を始めるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Before I depart to hunt for Nemesite, I ask the Domin to bless me. I pledged never to leave your side, yet the hunt demands that I do just that. Grant me this permission by performing the ceremony of twining." {n}Kibellah nods toward the altar.{/n} "When your people have taken their leave, under the gaze of the Undying One, we will begin the rite."

traits.locale_text: 「ネメサイト狩りに出発する前に、ドミンに祝福を願いたいです。あなたのそばを離れないと誓いましたが、狩りのために行かなければなりません。撚り合わせの儀式を行うことで、私にこの許可を与えてください」{n}キベラは祭壇に向かってうなずいた。{/n}「不死の者のまなざしの下で、あなたの民が旅立ったとき、私たちは儀式を始めるでしょう」

languages.text: “在我出发寻找涅墨斯特之前，我请求你祝福我，秘者。虽然我发誓要对你寸步不离，但为了这场狩猎，我不得不离开你身边。请允许我举行盘绕祭礼吧。”{n}绮贝菈朝祭坛点了点头。{/n}“等你的人离开之后，我们会在不死之神的注视下举行仪式。”
languages.original_text: "Before I depart to hunt for Nemesite, I ask the Domin to bless me. I pledged never to leave your side, yet the hunt demands that I do just that. Grant me this permission by performing the ceremony of twining." {n}Kibellah nods toward the altar.{/n} "When your people have taken their leave, under the gaze of the Undying One, we will begin the rite."

traits.locale_text: “在我出发寻找涅墨斯特之前，我请求你祝福我，秘者。虽然我发誓要对你寸步不离，但为了这场狩猎，我不得不离开你身边。请允许我举行盘绕祭礼吧。”{n}绮贝菈朝祭坛点了点头。{/n}“等你的人离开之后，我们会在不死之神的注视下举行仪式。”

languages.text: « Je demande la bénédiction {mf|du|de la} Domin avant de me mettre en chasse de Némésite. J'ai fait le serment de ne jamais vous quitter, et pourtant, la chasse m'oblige à le faire. Accordez-moi cette permission en accomplissant la cérémonie de jumelage. » {n}Kibellah désigne l'autel d'un hochement de tête.{/n} « Dès que vos gens auront pris congé, nous entamerons le rituel sous la supervision de l'Immortel. »
languages.original_text: "Before I depart to hunt for Nemesite, I ask the Domin to bless me. I pledged never to leave your side, yet the hunt demands that I do just that. Grant me this permission by performing the ceremony of twining." {n}Kibellah nods toward the altar.{/n} "When your people have taken their leave, under the gaze of the Undying One, we will begin the rite."

traits.locale_text: « Je demande la bénédiction {mf|du|de la} Domin avant de me mettre en chasse de Némésite. J'ai fait le serment de ne jamais vous quitter, et pourtant, la chasse m'oblige à le faire. Accordez-moi cette permission en accomplissant la cérémonie de jumelage. » {n}Kibellah désigne l'autel d'un hochement de tête.{/n} « Dès que vos gens auront pris congé, nous entamerons le rituel sous la supervision de l'Immortel. »

languages.text: "Nemezit'i avlamak için yola çıkmadan önce Domin'den beni kutsamasını rica ediyorum. Yanından asla ayrılmayacağıma ant içmiştim ancak av, bana tam olarak bunu yapmamı emrediyor. Büküm törenini gerçekleştirerek bana bu izni bahşet." {n}Kibellah, başıyla sunağı işaret ediyor.{/n} "Tebaan uzaklaştığında Ölmeyen'in bakışları altında ayine başlayacağız."
languages.original_text: "Before I depart to hunt for Nemesite, I ask the Domin to bless me. I pledged never to leave your side, yet the hunt demands that I do just that. Grant me this permission by performing the ceremony of twining." {n}Kibellah nods toward the altar.{/n} "When your people have taken their leave, under the gaze of the Undying One, we will begin the rite."
